title: VfL Wolfsburg | Dxs Wiki | Fandom
snippet: On 24 May 2022, Niko Kovač was appointed as Wolfsburg's new head coach with contract lasting until June 2025.[12] Wolfsburg plays at the Volkswagen Arena, a multi-purpose stadium which seats a total capacity of 30,000 spectators.

title: Saël Kumbedi moves to VfL Wolfsburg on permanent contract
snippet: VfL Wolfsburg and Olympique Lyonnais have reached an agreement regarding Saël Kumbedi. Wolfsburg initially signed the 20-year-old French right-back on a loan until the end of the 2025/26 season.
